list.c

00001 // ==================================================================
00002 // @(#)list.c
00003 //
00004 // @author Bruno Quoitin (bqu@infonet.fundp.ac.be), Sebastien Tandel
00005 // @date 23/11/2002
00006 // @lastdate 13/06/2003
00007 // ==================================================================
00008 // Warning: performance of 'list_add' are poor (due to realloc +
00009 // memmove) but memory usage and research are optimal !!!
00010 // 
00011 // 13/06/2003 : added the possibility to resize the list by uStepResize.
00012 // it improves the performance by reducing the number of realloc done 
00013 // but the number of memmove remains the same !
00014 
00015 #include <stdlib.h>
00016 #include <string.h>
00017 
00018 #include "list.h"
00019 #include "memory.h"
00020 
00021 // ----- list_compare -----------------------------------------------
00025 int list_compare(void * pItem1, void * pItem2)
00026 {
00027   if (pItem1 == pItem2)
00028     return 0;
00029   else if (pItem1 < pItem2)
00030     return -1;
00031   else
00032     return 1;
00033 }
00034 
00035 // ----- list_create ------------------------------------------------
00039 SList * list_create(FListCompare fCompare,
00040                     FListDestroy fDestroy, unsigned int uStepResize)
00041 {
00042   SList * pList= (SList *) MALLOC(sizeof(SList));
00043   pList->iSize= 0;
00044         pList->uNbrElt = 0;
00045         if (pList->uStepResize == 0) 
00046                 uStepResize = 1;
00047         pList->uStepResize = uStepResize;
00048   pList->fCompare= fCompare;
00049   pList->fDestroy= fDestroy;
00050   pList->ppItems= NULL;
00051   return pList;
00052 }
00053 
00054 // ----- list_destroy -----------------------------------------------
00058 void list_destroy(SList ** ppList)
00059 {
00060   int iIndex;
00061 
00062   if (*ppList != NULL) {
00063     if ((*ppList)->ppItems != NULL) {
00064       if ((*ppList)->fDestroy != NULL)
00065         for (iIndex= 0; iIndex < (*ppList)->uNbrElt; iIndex++)
00066           (*ppList)->fDestroy(&(*ppList)->ppItems[iIndex]);
00067       FREE((*ppList)->ppItems);
00068       (*ppList)->ppItems= NULL;
00069     }
00070     FREE(*ppList);
00071     *ppList= NULL;
00072   }
00073 }
00074 
00075 // ----- list_find_index --------------------------------------------
00080 int list_find_index(SList * pList, void * pItem, int * piIndex)
00081 {
00082   int iOffset= 0;
00083   int iSize= pList->uNbrElt;
00084   int iPos= iSize/2;
00085   int iCompareResult;
00086 
00087   while (iSize > 0) {
00088     iCompareResult= ((pList->fCompare != NULL)?
00089                      pList->fCompare(pList->ppItems[iPos], pItem):
00090                      list_compare(pList->ppItems[iPos], pItem));
00091     if (!iCompareResult) {
00092       *piIndex= iPos;
00093       return 0;
00094     } else if (iCompareResult > 0) {
00095       if (iPos > iOffset) {
00096         iSize= iPos-iOffset;
00097         iPos= iOffset+iSize/2;
00098       } else
00099         break;
00100     } else {
00101       if (iOffset+iSize-iPos > 0) {
00102         iSize= iOffset+iSize-iPos-1;
00103         iOffset= iPos+1;
00104         iPos= iOffset+iSize/2;
00105       } else
00106         break;
00107     }
00108   }
00109   *piIndex= iPos;
00110   return -1;
00111 }
00112 
00113 // ----- list_resized_if_required -----------------------------------
00117 void list_resize(SList * pList)
00118 {
00119         if (pList->ppItems != NULL)
00120                 if (pList->iSize == 0) {
00121                         FREE(pList->ppItems);
00122                         pList->ppItems = NULL;
00123                 }
00124                 else
00125                         pList->ppItems= REALLOC(pList->ppItems, sizeof(void *)*pList->iSize);
00126         else
00127                 pList->ppItems= MALLOC(sizeof(void *)*pList->iSize);
00128 }
00129 // ----- list_insert_index ------------------------------------------
00133 int list_insert_index(SList * pList, int iIndex, void * pItem)
00134 {
00135   if ((iIndex < 0) || (iIndex > pList->uNbrElt))
00136     return -1;
00137         
00138         pList->uNbrElt++;
00139   if (pList->uNbrElt >= pList->iSize) {
00140                 pList->iSize += pList->uStepResize;
00141                 list_resize(pList);
00142         }
00143         
00144         if (iIndex < pList->uNbrElt - 1) {
00145     memmove(&pList->ppItems[iIndex+1], &pList->ppItems[iIndex],
00146             sizeof(void *)*(pList->uNbrElt-iIndex-1));
00147         }
00148 
00149   pList->ppItems[iIndex]= pItem;
00150   return 0;
00151 }
00152 
00153 // ----- list_get_nbr_element ---------------------------------------
00157 int list_get_nbr_element(SList * pList)
00158 {
00159         return pList->uNbrElt;
00160 }
00161 
00162 // ----- list_get_index ---------------------------------------------
00163 /*
00164  *
00165  */
00166 void * list_get_index(SList * pList, int iIndex)
00167 {
00168         if (iIndex >= pList->uNbrElt)
00169                 return NULL;
00170 
00171         return pList->ppItems[iIndex];
00172 }
00173 // ----- list_add ---------------------------------------------------
00177 int list_add(SList * pList, void * pItem)
00178 {
00179   int iIndex;
00180 
00181   if (list_find_index(pList, pItem, &iIndex) < 0)
00182     return list_insert_index(pList, iIndex, pItem);
00183   return -1; // Item already exists
00184 }
00185 
00186 // ----- list_delete ------------------------------------------------
00187 /*
00188  *
00189  */
00190 int list_delete(SList * pList, int iIndex)
00191 {
00192         if (iIndex > pList->uNbrElt)
00193                 return -1;
00194 
00195         if (pList->fDestroy != NULL)
00196                 pList->fDestroy(&pList->ppItems[iIndex]);
00197         
00198         memcpy(pList->ppItems[iIndex], pList->ppItems[iIndex+1], sizeof(void *)*(pList->uNbrElt - (iIndex+1)));
00199         
00200         if (pList->uStepResize <= pList->iSize - --(pList->uNbrElt)) {
00201                 pList->iSize -= pList->uStepResize;
00202                 list_resize(pList);
00203         }
00204         return 0;
00205 }
00206 // ----- list_replace -----------------------------------------------
00210 int list_replace(SList * pList, int iIndex, void * pItem)
00211 {
00212         if (iIndex >= pList->uNbrElt)
00213                 return -1;
00214 
00215   if (pList->fDestroy != NULL)
00216     pList->fDestroy(&pList->ppItems[iIndex]);
00217   pList->ppItems[iIndex]= pItem;
00218   return 0;
00219 }
00220 
00221 // ----- list_for_each ----------------------------------------------
00225 void list_for_each(SList * pList, FListForEach fForEach, void * pContext)
00226 {
00227   int iIndex;
00228 
00229   for (iIndex= 0; iIndex < pList->iSize; iIndex++)
00230     fForEach(pList->ppItems[iIndex], pContext);
00231 }
00232 
00233 // ----- list_copy --------------------------------------------------
00237 SList * list_copy(SList * pList, FListCopyItem fCopyItem)
00238 {
00239   int iIndex;
00240 
00241   SList * pNewList= list_create(pList->fCompare, pList->fDestroy, pList->uStepResize);
00242   pNewList->iSize= pList->iSize;
00243         pNewList->uNbrElt = pList->uNbrElt;
00244         
00245   pNewList->ppItems= MALLOC(sizeof(void *)*pNewList->iSize);
00246   if (fCopyItem == NULL)
00247     memcpy(pNewList->ppItems, pList->ppItems, sizeof(void *)*pNewList->uNbrElt);
00248   else
00249     for (iIndex= 0; iIndex < pNewList->uNbrElt; iIndex++)
00250       pNewList->ppItems[iIndex]= fCopyItem(pList->ppItems[iIndex]);
00251   return pNewList;
00252 }
